subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: After opening with a 62 on Thursday, Watson had three birdies in a bogey-free morning round to enter weekend at 11 under par at the Travelers Championship in Cromwell, Conn.
snippet: After opening with a 62 on Thursday, Watson had three birdies in a bogey-free morning round to enter weekend at 11 under par at the Travelers Championship in Cromwell, Conn.
